name: Dark-Lord M
description:
The Mecca of the Real-Time Server Integration Battlefield with Dark Fantasy!

Aura Force Changes by Equipment Tier
→ Acquire the desired tier by tracking the equipment boss.

Extreme Cluster Set following Aura Force by Tier
→ Best equipment set item in rainbow background!
→ Set effect according to the number of mountings per part!

Server Integrated Battlegrounds where real-time server-to-server fighting takes place
→ Who will be the best authority for servers!?
→ The battle for the kingdom begins!

PvP, PvE A series of tensions that cannot be left out
→ Connecting systems across safe and dangerous areas to grow
→ Is it hostile or peaceful? the connection of the unknown mission


Public Community

Moot: https://moot.us/lounges/300
